name: As Times Before
description:
As Times below is a short, top down, puzzle adventure game where you control where in the timeline you are. Interact with the past and things may not be the same when you return to the present.

Controls =====================================================

Arrow Keys - Move. Pushing against an item selects it and tells you what it is.

Z -  Pick up selected object.

X - Use current inventory item with selected item.

C - Change current inventory item.

H - Receive a hint from the all knowing Orb in future.

Credits ======================================================

This game was made using Javidx9's Pixel Game Engine. I used the splash screen extension which can be found here.

Notes =======================================================

The Executable is in the files folder.

Should take at most 15 seconds to boot up.

I got the gameplay to where I wanted it, however I was not able to get the music working and for that I am sorry.
